features: 【DUST-PROOF STRAW LID】 The new patent straw lid have a dust cover ,it is keeping the spout clean and covered between uses, as well as for a handy little lever with which is easily and quickly flip the spout open, vs having to pry it up with your fingertips.

【PUSH BOTTOM SPOUT LID】The auto-flip spout lid designed with inclined angle mouth is more suitable for one-handed drinking experience,the drink spout allows a large amount of water flow without too much force to absorb water, allowing large ice or fruits to be put in, which is very suitable for the needs of various occasions.

【BPA FREE AND LEAK PROOF】XACIOA water bottle with straw lids are BPA free,food-safe and recyclable,it keeps your ice drink COLD for up to 24 hours, and HOT for up to 12 hours,Make sure your every sip is the felling you want.The 3 replacement lids seal well and are leak-proof, so you can drink on the go without spilling, and don't worry get wet and putting it in your bag.

【PREMIUM 18/8 STAINLESS STEEL】The insulated water bottle is made of 18/8 stainless steelwith double-walled,it is BPA free and non-toxic. It will never leave a metal taste or rust. And the powder coating exterior finish ensures a better grip, and its wide-mouth opening makes your ice or fruits filling and cleaning easy and fast.

【A FULL PACK】: Included with 3 lids, 2 straws, 1 straw brush,the XACIOA insulated bottle is fully accessorized to handle any tricky situations. We offer lifetime warranty,and our friendly customer care are always happy to help,risk-free purchase.
body.description: XACIOA Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw and 3 Lids WHY CHOOSE US If you are looking for a vacuum insulated water bottle that will keep your beverage hot for up to 12 hours and cold for up to 24 hours ? The XACIOA is a great choice.with variety of sizes,lids and colors The patent straw lid is easy to use flip straw, a high-flow rate to meet your daily hydration on-the-goThe spout lid allows maximum water flow and easy one-handed drinking.the wide flexible rotating handle makes drink easier and more convenientThe handle lid perfect for hiking,walking and office BPA and phthalate free 18/8 food-grade stainless steel Vacuum insulation keep Hot for 12 hours and Cold for 24 hours 3 UNIQUE LIDS available Double-walled insulated design Many beautiful colors to choose from All lids are perfect compatible with Hydro Flask, Simple Modern, Takeya, HYDRO CELL and almost of other wide mouth bottles

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and sturdy practical container
reviews.reviewText: Definitely would recommend product easy to use and clean. Keeps content cold work 12hrs shifts and it really is great because container maintains temperature without requiring refrigeration. Also, it's great for when outdoors or for workouts. Container does not generate condensate so you can safely store on any type of furniture and the colors are amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Features and temperature
reviews.reviewText: This water bottle is great. I fill it up with water and six ice cubes and it maintains the cold temperature. I love the features of 3 tops and brush cleaner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Water stays cold all day long!
reviews.reviewText: Genuinely the best water bottle I've ever had. It's a bit big but it's really nice for carring around with me all day since sometimes it can be hard to find somewhere to refill a smaller bottle. I put some ice in it, fill the rest with water, and sip from the straw all day. By the end of the night the ice is STILL FROZEN! This is easily the best, most efficient water bottle I've owned! Plus I can just chuck it in the dish washer and bam! The wide mouth also let's me clean it by hand with stick scrubber if I need to! Super happy with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps it cold like it says!!
reviews.reviewText: I love, love, love these water bottles!!! I bought one, my daughter bought one and her friend bought one!!! Then i dropped mine right on the edge of the bottom and dented it. Well from that point on it would not keep ice at all!! It is not the fault of the water bottle in any way!! I knew when i dropped it that i did something to it! So...... i jumped on Amazon and bought another! Also got one for my 8 yr old going back to school!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I like the bottle overall and it really does not leak. One reason I picked this bottle was that I really liked the shape of the bottle. I also liked the design that the straw cap has a cover on top so my straw is not exposed to the air and I would put that back in my mouth again. The only thing was that it seems not to keep my water hot long enough as I thought.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great bottle. Like the 3 different kinds of bottle caps. Theres no leakage at all. Very easy to clean. Its also very durable too. Been using it since i ordered it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite water bottle!
reviews.reviewText: I love this water bottle. It’s sturdy, durable and keeps my water cold! The mouth is wide enough to add ice, easily. The color is great, exactly as pictured, The only thing I would change is the bottom configuration. It doesn’t fit in my car cup holder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A nice size
reviews.reviewText: I like the three tops. Love the brush for cleaning straws
Es una botella de gran capacidad aún que un poco pesada para depende de qué uso me encanta pero al final acaba siendo muy grande para uso diario.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Keeps drinks cold for nearly 48 hours!
reviews.reviewText: I have bought many different drinking bottles over the years and this one stands out as the best of them all. It holds a good amount of liquid (1.2l) and most importantly has a really durable seal, meaning no leaks at all. There are several different tops included with the bottle, along with two internal straws (one spare) and a straw cleaner.I regularly drink 3-4 full bottles of water a day and have also been able to keep beverages cold (with the addition of ice) for 48 hours, with ice cubes still remaining.The bottle is strong and well made and I would buy another in a heartbeat.
Mantiene per molto tempo i liquidi caldi e freddiPratico
Schöne Farben, war das beste was ich unserer Tochter für die schule schenken konnte. Läuft nicht aus, hält das Getränk Dank Edelstahl schön kühl.
Using it to make sure I drink enough water every day. It keeps it cool all day.
